title: Lock on + Flamming Cliffs + updates + Mods (Works on Daemon tool
description:
I had to search around the whole internet to find all files so I decided to just put them all together.

The Flaming Cliffs 1.1 version of the game is working perfectly with daemon tools with all the emulations on. I included a video showing how i installed and tested... you dont have to download it if you want to save space.


[EDIT]

I found out how to make the Flaming Cliff update to work without the CD Key...
Thanks to thepiratebay guys commenting on it so i post it on here.

Do this steps in the exact order and you should be up and running:

1) mount Lock on 1.0 and install
2) update to 1.02 --- VERY IMPORTANT
3) mount Flaming Cliff 1.1 and install
4) update to 1.12b GOLD EURO edition -- VERY IMPORTANT TOO.

after that should run perfectly... if not, do all the steps exactly the same but install Anti-Blaxx 1.18... in the settings point to the game executable and also point to the daemon executable... use the Securerom 7 emulation. (I did not need to do this in order to work but until now I heard a lot of people saying it worked that way, even though i figured out that it was because of the patch and not the program itself)

In my torrent I used the web edition which will not work.
To download the gold euro go to http://lockon.co.uk/
then go to files > downloads and go to flamming cliffs updates.

You have to be registered to do that.

If you dont want to register download it from here:
http://www.4shared.com/file/97472276/ad0c16c1/FC_Patch_112__Gold-Euro_.html

I uploaded the version from lockon.co.uk.

Well thats the basic info...

Personal Note:

If you like this game then consider purchasing it... this game is too good, and there is much work involved in it. Help the development!!

I uploaded it because I also was out of money a lot of times so if you download PLEASE SEED.
